SELECT TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') AS py_date , NVL(SUM(a.cnt), 0) cnt FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(py_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS py_date , sum(py_price) cnt FROM pay WHERE py_status='true' and py_date BETWEEN TO_DATE('2021-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2021-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') GROUP BY py_date ) a , ( SELECT TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= (TO_DATE('2021-12-31','YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2021-01-01','YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) b WHERE b.dt = a.py_date(+) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(b.dt, 'YYYY-MM')
